DOC.brief_summary: To determine whether point of care (POC) International Normalized Ratio (INR) test results correlate with plasma INR measures in hemodialysis patients.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Point of Care to Lab INR in Dialysis Patients on Warfarin
DOC.detailed_description: 37 chronic hemodialysis patients being anticoagulated with warfarin require INR monitoring routinely.
DOC.criteria: Chronic dialysis patients on chronic warfarin anticoagulation. On warfarin for less than 1 month.
